name: Crunches
instruction: Lie down on the mat, keep your knees bent and your back and feet flat. Lift your shoulders, squeeze your abdominal muscles and hold for 1 to 2 seconds. Slowly return to the starting position and repeat until set is complete.
hints: When doing crunches keep your head in a neutral position, with your eyes on the ceiling and the chin off your chest. Breathe out as you crunch, maintain your core muscles tight and engaged, and keep the elbows out.
